revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ParkerVision |model=WR1500 |revision= |upc=884181000031 |ean= |asin=B0002ER6GK;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/11/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=ZyXEL |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=JFE-D2D00003 |ic_id=5008A-D2D00003 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=ZyDAS |cpu1_model=ZD2001;ZyDAS, ZD2001, MV37942.1 0414, WAVEPLUS, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160ABTC-90 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432EH-7 |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=ZyDAS |wi1_chip1_model=ZD1201;ZyDAS ARM, VT22387, S31353.1, Zt0349, ZyDAS, ZD1201; |wi1_chip2_brand=ParkerVision |wi1_chip2_model=2000TR;D2D, 2000TR, 12-031206; |wi1_chip3_brand=ParkerVision |wi1_chip3_model=2000TR;D2D, 2000TR, 12-031206; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996L;ADM6996L, AA0417, HAS408026.1SL; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Wireless |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.150.1 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:0E:5B |oui_eth=00:A0:C5 }} aka '''WR3000'''
"45-401-000323" and "Made in Taiwan" is silkscreened on the board. :{{see also|MitraStar|ZyXEL}} The text found on the SoC would seem to indicate it is (or is based upon) a '''WavePlus''' SoC.
==Images== <gallery> File:ParkerVision WR1500 mainboard top.jpg|mainboard top File:ParkerVision WR1500 mainboard bot.jpg|mainboard bottom </gallery> <gallery> File:ParkerVision WR1500 wireless module top.jpg|wireless module top File:ParkerVision WR1500 wireless module bot.jpg|wireless module bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
